translated: Sarah Bernhardt, born Oct. 22, 1844 and died March 26, 1923 (79 years) in Paris, is a French theater actress, also became actress of silent film at the end of his career.
original: Sarah Bernhardt, née le 22 octobre 1844 et morte le 26 mars 1923 (à 79 ans) à Paris, est une actrice de théâtre française, aussi devenue actrice du cinéma muet à la fin de sa carrière.
